\newcommand{\yields}[0]{\Downarrow}\mdHxx[id=sec-problem-m,label={1},toc={},data-line={20},caption={Problem M},bookmark={Problem M}]{%mdk-data-line={20}
{}Problem M}\begin{mdP}[data-line={22}]%
%mdk-data-line={22}
{}Using calculational proof, prove that:%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdP}[class={indent},data-line={24}]%
%mdk-data-line={24}
{}(o ((curry map) f) ((curry map) g)) == ((curry map) (o f g))%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdP}[class={indent},data-line={26}]%
%mdk-data-line={26}
{}Given:%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={28}]%
\mdPrecode{((o\prespace{1}f\prespace{1}g)\prespace{1}x)\prespace{1}==\prespace{1}(f\prespace{1}(g\prespace{1}x))\prespace{14};\prespace{1}apply-compose\prespace{1}law\prebr{}
(((curry\prespace{1}f)\prespace{1}x)\prespace{1}y)\prespace{1}==\prespace{1}(f\prespace{1}x\prespace{1}y)\prespace{10};\prespace{1}apply-curried\prespace{1}law}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={31}]%
%mdk-data-line={31}
{}If they are equal they will return the same thing when called on a list ys.%
\end{mdP}%
\mdHxxx[id=sec-proof,label={1},toc={},data-line={33},caption={Proof},bookmark={Proof}]{%mdk-data-line={33}
{}Proof}\begin{mdP}[data-line={35}]%
%mdk-data-line={35}
{}((o ((curry map) f) ((curry map) g)) ys)%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={37}]%
\mdPrecode{=\prespace{1}\{apply-compose\prespace{1}law\}}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={39}]%
%mdk-data-line={39}
{}((((curry map) f) (((curry map) g) ys)))%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={41}]%
\mdPrecode{=\prespace{1}\{apply-curried\prespace{1}law\}}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={43}]%
%mdk-data-line={43}
{}(map f ((curry map) g) ys)%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={45}]%
\mdPrecode{=\prespace{1}\{apply-curried\prespace{1}law\}}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={47}]%
%mdk-data-line={47}
{}(map f (map g ys))%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={49}]%
\mdPrecode{=\prespace{1}\{apply-compose\prespace{1}law\}}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={51}]%
%mdk-data-line={51}
{}(map (o f g) ys)%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdPre}[class={para-block,pre-indented},data-line={53}]%
\mdPrecode{=\prespace{1}\{apply-curried\prespace{1}law\}}%
\end{mdPre}%
\begin{mdP}[data-line={55}]%
%mdk-data-line={55}
{}(((curry map) (o f g)) ys)%
\end{mdP}%
\mdHxxx[id=sec-conclusion,label={2},toc={},data-line={57},caption={Conclusion},bookmark={Conclusion}]{%mdk-data-line={57}
{}Conclusion}\begin{mdP}[data-line={59}]%
%mdk-data-line={59}
{}This is the same as the right side when called on ys so:%
\end{mdP}%
\begin{mdP}[class={indent},data-line={61}]%
%mdk-data-line={61}
{}(o ((curry map) f) ((curry map) g)) == ((curry map) (o f g))%
\end{mdP}%
